definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
surname Shao/name of an ancient state that existed in what is now Shaanxi Province
to call together/to summon/to convene/temple or monastery (used in place names in Inner Mongolia)

sentences.english: Will you watch over the baby while I'm out?
sentences.chinese: 我外出時你炤料這個嬰兒好嗎？

sentences.english: The scout with shoulder-straps hurrahed on the outermost route for a routine.
sentences.chinese: 戴肩章的偵察員炤例在最外圍的路線上叫喊。

sentences.english: A bougie lights others and consumes itself.
sentences.chinese: 蠟燭炤亮別人，卻毀滅了自己。

sentences.english: The X-rayed chant preyed a gray salver.
sentences.chinese: 炤過X光的祈禱者捕獲了一個灰色盤子。

sentences.english: The scout with shoulder-straps hurrahed on the outermost route for a customary.
sentences.chinese: 戴肩章的偵察員炤例在最外圍的路線上叫喊。

sentences.english: I am the stars warmly greaming, over Darnassus lightly dreaming.
sentences.chinese: 我是溫暖閃耀的星，炤耀達納蘇斯的靜謐長眠。

sentences.english: Love is photogenic. It absences darkness to develop.
sentences.chinese: 愛情就象炤片，需要大量的暗房時間來培養。

sentences.english: I would like to present our remarks in the following array.
sentences.chinese: 我希望能依炤以下的順序提出我們的看法。

sentences.english: Looking at the picture, I know he definitely had his own ideas.
sentences.chinese: 看著這張炤片，我知道他的確有他自己的想法。

definition: tripod with a small opening on top
multitudinous/the masses/to present (to sb)/to rise/to advance/to progress/archaic variant of 蒸[zheng1]
